services
Brand Identity System
Visual Identity System

Any business needs a professional and transparent brand image system. Those are the core images of a brand or a campaign with the desire to increase product value and enhance brand value.

  • POWER OF VISUAL IDENTITY SYSTEM
  • DESIGN CRITERIA
  • DESIGN PROCESS
  • PROJECT
  • WHY CHOOSE US
  • Q&A
Power of Visual Identity System
  • 01 - Help the company become more professional Brand image will help positively impact the business, helping the brand become more attractive, more professional in the minds of customers.
  • 02 - Write a brand story Brand image will help customers visualize the personality and mission of the brand. From there, help businesses convey the emotional brand story through communication plans.
  • 03 - Creating differentiated values for brands The process of building a unique brand image is the first step to create a separate competitive advantage for businesses in the market.
Benefits of Visual Identity System
  • 01 - Synchronous and consistent identification The image of an enterprise's brand is expressed through its core values, vision and mission built from the beginning and throughout, consistent in the development process of the brand.
  • 02 - Enhancing corporate brand Designing a brand image focusing on the uniqueness and distinctiveness of the business helps to raise the brand, making the brand automatically stand out no matter how fierce the market is.
  • 03 - Closely connected with customers Brand image must create an impression and engage with potential customers of the business, parallel in their minds. And the brand will resonate over time thanks to what customers share with friends, relatives and the surrounding community.
Design Criteria
Clear brand positioning
Convey brand message
Ensure practical applicability
Creative, modern, simple
Unique differences
Consistent throughout use
Design Process
At Brandast, we pride ourselves on building meaningful, lasting relationships with our customers. We go above and beyond to add value to your business by providing innovative solutions that make your brand more known, better understood and truly unique.

Why choose Brandast?
FAQs
  • 01 - Is the brand image a logo?
      Logo is a symbol that conveys the core values of the business. The brand image system is an innovative combination of image elements so that they have the same language and consistent message about the Brand, through them, consumers can easily associate and identify. Trademark.
  • 01 - How is the brand image shown?
      Most of the factors that reflect the brand are tangible (logos, business cards, packaging, posters ...). Therefore, a brand does not necessarily have one or more Brand images. The problem is that through them, consumers must immediately think about the brand and its superior values.

Start creating projects with Brandast !

Brandast ignites passion and enthusiasm for beautiful designs. We proudly promote your brand’s story, create a professional brand and capture the hearts and minds of your customers.
